# The `AArch64ImmCheck.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file implements the <a href="/docs/api/classes/immcheck">ImmCheck</a> class which supports the range-checking of immediate values supplied to AArch64 SVE/SME and NEON intrinsics. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/immcheck">ImmCheck</a></>}>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This file implements the <a href="/docs/api/classes/immcheck">ImmCheck</a> class which supports the range-checking of immediate values supplied to AArch64 SVE/SME and NEON intrinsics.
